brief_desc.en-US: Run a command in a new container

description.en-US: Run a command in a new container with various options for configuring the container's runtime environment.
description.zh-CN: 在新容器中运行命令，提供各种选项来配置容器的运行环境。

description.en-US: Run container in background and print container ID
description.zh-CN: 在后台运行容器并打印容器 ID

description.en-US: Publish a container's port(s) to the host
description.zh-CN: 将容器的端口发布到主机

description.en-US: Attach to STDIN, STDOUT or STDERR
description.zh-CN: 附加到 STDIN、STDOUT 或 STDERR

description.en-US: Set environment variables
description.zh-CN: 设置环境变量

description.en-US: Bind mount a volume
description.zh-CN: 绑定挂载一个卷

description.en-US: Allocate a pseudo-TTY
description.zh-CN: 分配一个伪终端

description.en-US: Keep STDIN open even if not attached
description.zh-CN: 即使未附加也保持 STDIN 打开

description.en-US: Container host name
description.zh-CN: 容器主机名

description.en-US: Memory limit
description.zh-CN: 内存限制

description.en-US: Number of CPUs
description.zh-CN: CPU 数量

description.en-US: Assign a name to the container
description.zh-CN: 为容器分配一个名称

description.en-US: Connect a container to a network
description.zh-CN: 将容器连接到网络

description.en-US: Restart policy to apply when a container exits
description.zh-CN: 容器退出时应用的重启策略

description.en-US: Optional volume driver for the container
description.zh-CN: 容器的可选卷驱动程序

description.en-US: Size of /dev/shm
description.zh-CN: /dev/shm 的大小

description.en-US: Read environment variables from a file
description.zh-CN: 从文件中读取环境变量

description.en-US: Set custom DNS servers
description.zh-CN: 设置自定义 DNS 服务器

description.en-US: Set custom DNS search domains
description.zh-CN: 设置自定义 DNS 搜索域

description.en-US: IPv4 address to assign to the container
description.zh-CN: 分配给容器的 IPv4 地址

description.en-US: IPv6 address to assign to the container
description.zh-CN: 分配给容器的 IPv6 地址
